pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by Ruben-VandeVelde.

LGTM taking into account Yael's comment.

bors d+

:v: urkud can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

> Can you add the `Int.cast` versions?

Do you know a good home for `Odd.intCast`? `#find_home` says:
```
[Mathlib.Algebra.BigOperators.Finprod,
 Mathlib.Algebra.Module.Card,
 Mathlib.ModelTheory.Ultraproducts,
 Mathlib.Data.Rat.Cast.Defs,
 Mathlib.Order.Filter.FilterProduct,
 Mathlib.Tactic.Qify,
 Mathlib.Data.Num.Lemmas,
 Mathlib.RingTheory.NonUnitalSubsemiring.Basic,
 Mathlib.Combinatorics.SetFamily.LYM,
 Mathlib.Combinatorics.Pigeonhole,
 Mathlib.Algebra.Module.Basic,
 Mathlib.Data.Set.Pointwise.SMul,
 Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Module.Defs,
 Mathlib.Combinatorics.Enumerative.Composition,
 Mathlib.Tactic.Positivity.Basic,
 Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Interval.Set.Group,
 Mathlib.GroupTheory.Coprod.Basic]
 ```
 None of these look good to me.

As this PR is labelled `auto-merge-after-CI`, we are now sending it to bors:

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9391660893/job/25864313648)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9391660893/job/25864314201)
